com.backbase.csmdemo.application.impl

Class CSMApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.backbase.csmdemo.application.impl.CSMApp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IATMApp

    public class CSMApp
extends Object
implements IATMApp
    The CSM application used for business logic functions. ATM application functions. Making use of a bastardised https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prototype_pattern. The list of ATM is refreshed every 2 hours to keep our performance high.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    jasonbruwer on 11/3/17.

      • getUniqueCityNamesWhereContains

        public List<String> getUniqueCityNamesWhereContains(String cityLookupParam)
        Retrieve all the ATM cities where the city name cityLookupParam. If the name is empty, all the cities will be returned.
        Specified by:
        getUniqueCityNamesWhereContains in interface IATMApp
        Parameters:
        cityLookupParam - The lookup text to use.
        Returns:
        Listing of Cities.
